title: Get recommended hashtags for TikTok accounts

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The keyword that you want to get recommended hashtags for.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Keyword language. The language of the hashtag recommendations will match the keyword language. Default value : en (English). Enum values : en : English ar : Arabic bn-IN : Bengali ceb-PH : Cebuano cs-CZ : Czech de-DE : German el-GR : Greek es : Spanish fi-FI : Finnish fil-PH : Filipino fr : French he-IL : Hebrew hi-IN : Hindi hu-HU : Hungarian id-ID : Indonesian it-IT : Italian ja-JP : Japanese jv-ID : Javanese km-KH : Khmer ko-KR : Korean ms-MY : Malay my-MM : Burmese nl-NL : Dutch pl-PL : Polish pt-BR : Portuguese ro-RO : Romanian ru-RU : Russian sv-SE : Swedish th-TH : Thai tr-TR : Turkish uk-UA : Ukranian ur : Urdu vi-VN : Vietnamese zh-Hans : Chinese (simplified) zh-Hant-TW : Chinese (traditional)

top_fields.name: Date
top_fields.description: Date and time (GMT) when the response was received. Example : Fri, 13 Aug 2021 08:04:42 GMT

top_fields.name: X-Tt-Logid
top_fields.description: Unique identifier for the API request.

item_fields.name: request_id
item_fields.description: Unique identifier for the API request. Please record this field for all API requests. Important for issue reports and troubleshooting.

item_fields.name: code
item_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

item_fields.name: message
item_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Information .

item_fields.name: suggestions
item_fields.description: List of hashtag suggestions. 10 recommended hashtags will be provided in total and the hashtags are first ordered by exact match and then by the number of views. Note : If no hashtag suggestion is available for the keyword you specify, we will return the same keyword in name , and view_count will be 0.

item_fields.name: view_count
item_fields.description: The number of views that the recommended hashtag has received.
